attributes.action: Remove Havering borough from Greater London and rejoin the county of Essex
attributes.additional_details: The ulez expansion will destroy many businesses within Havering, it will disproportionally affect the less affluent people within the borough that cant afford to buy newer cars that are ulez compliant, the ulez expansion has little to do wirh pollution its mayor Khan's attempt to fill the huge shortfall in tfl's budget
attributes.background: Hold a referendum within the London Borough of Havering to remove the borough from Greater London and return it to the County of Essex

rejection.details:
Proposals for changes to local authority boundaries are the responsibility of the relevant local authorities, not the Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
